body: bruh this a rape doujin...what did u expect (btw..... IF SHE BREATH SHe'S A  THOOOT)  now draw ur light saber and duel me!

This is some mediocre doujin as the art is amazing and the girls are fantastic. However, I dislike that they are being treated like slaves and the author instead should draw them where they are being treated equally or greater as queens. ( I mean come on, if she breathes she's a queen.) 

Rating: 2/10
Glad the comments are back tho :)
